profile.introduction: I am a young technology enthusiast, from an early age video games have caught my attention and over time the internet. As I grew older, every time I was very curious to know how the games and the pages I visited worked, that's when I got to know programming and became more and more fond of it.
profile.about-1: Currently I don't have a lot of experience working with programming in general, but I'm quite a quick learner and confident in my abilities. Mainly the Back-end development catches my attention since it is the part with which I feel most identified, but I have also learned to love the Front-end, although I am still learning both areas.
profile.about-2: Otherwise I have a high understanding of the English language, I can write texts and communicate conversationally with someone who speaks natural English, despite the fact that my mother tongue is Spanish.

experiences.project-1: A E-commerce made only in html & JavaScript, it has integrated a JavaScript function that simulates a buyout
experiences.project-2: Weather app made in React.js consuming a API that need to obtain users permission to work with GeoLocation
experiences.project-3: A Rick & Morty wiki that randomly take you to different universes consuming a API from R&M universes
